283.customerMessage6: Liked ‚ÄúThanks. It looks like the $308 price is in effect, and the taxes and shipping is on top of that. This is why you're seeing a higher price at checkout.‚Äù
283.customerMessage7: I guess my last question is why should I pay NY sales tax when you are shipping out of state and there is not a store in NC. Usually, if there isn't a store in my state, the item is shipped to me but I don't pay sales tax.
283.AgentMessage6: White & Warren: Great question! Sales tax is charged based on state tax laws, not store locations. New York requires sales tax to be collected on certain transactions, even when items are shipped out of state. If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to let me know.
